page.title: 16Daily Life for a 10yr. Old.
page.content: On Saturday I usually wake up late.I switch on my personal stereo then draw my curtains to see the sunshine.I have a shower after my brother. After breakfast mum and I go and change our library books. When we return I go out for a burn' on my bike while my mum cooks a big lunch rather than an evening meal because you can't swim on a full tummy. After lunch one of my friends comes to play. We may have a frame of snooker, but if the weather's good we go out on our bikes and meet the other boys in a field in Adstone. We take my friend home at 5 o'clock then my brother and I go to a gala. When we get home we are both tired.
